name: Derrald HANDY, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Respondent

parties: Derrald HANDY, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of February, 2013, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
61 A.3d 193
Derrald HANDY, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Respondent.
No. 209 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 7, 2013.
